Package com.kneelawk.kmodlib.client.blockmodel.sprite

Interface UnbakedSpriteSupplier

All Known Implementing Classes:
UnbakedStaticSpriteSupplier
public interface UnbakedSpriteSupplier
Unbaked sprite supplier for use in just about every kind of model that uses sprites.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final com.mojang.serialization.Codec<UnbakedSpriteSupplier>
    CODEC
    The unbaked sprite supplier codec.

  • Field Details

    • CODEC

      static final com.mojang.serialization.Codec<UnbakedSpriteSupplier> CODEC
      The unbaked sprite supplier codec.

      Note that this is either an identifier or an object registry lookup. If this is an identifier, it is considered to be the identifier of a static texture.

  • Method Details

    • getCodec

      com.mojang.serialization.Codec<? extends UnbakedSpriteSupplier> getCodec()
      Returns:
      the codec registered with KBlockModels.SPRITE_SUPPLIER_REGISTRY.

    • bakesToSprite

      boolean bakesToSprite()
      Returns:
      whether this sprite supplier bakes to a static sprite.

    • bakeToSprite

      @Nullable @Nullable net.minecraft.client.texture.Sprite bakeToSprite(Function<net.minecraft.client.util.SpriteIdentifier,net.minecraft.client.texture.Sprite> textureGetter, @Nullable @Nullable net.minecraft.client.render.model.ModelBakeSettings rotationContainer, net.minecraft.util.Identifier modelId)
      Bakes this sprite supplier into a static sprite if possible.
      Parameters:
      textureGetter - the supplied texture getter function.
      rotationContainer - the supplied rotation container.
      modelId - the baking model's id.
      Returns:
      this as a static sprite, or null if this cannot bake to a static sprite, an error occurred, or this just bakes to null.

    • bake

      @Nullable @Nullable BakedSpriteSupplier bake(Function<net.minecraft.client.util.SpriteIdentifier,net.minecraft.client.texture.Sprite> textureGetter, @Nullable @Nullable net.minecraft.client.render.model.ModelBakeSettings rotationContainer, net.minecraft.util.Identifier modelId)
      Bakes this sprite supplier into a baked sprite supplier.
      Parameters:
      textureGetter - the supplied texture getter function.
      rotationContainer - the supplied rotation container.
      modelId - the baking model's id.
      Returns:
      a baked sprite supplier, or null if an error occurred or this just bakes to null.
